about_the_game:
Welcome to the Dinosaurs in Place Demo!

Want to try a prehistoric adventure before getting the full version? In the Dinosaurs in Place demo, you’ll encounter the first 22 unique dinosaurs and 10 exciting levels that will offer you unforgettable gameplay and thrilling challenges.

What’s in the Demo:

  • 22 Unique Dinosaurs
    Discover a portion of the 40 hand-drawn dinosaurs collection. Each one has its own shape and character, presenting unique challenges for your mind.

  • 10 Exciting Levels
    Complete the first 10 levels that will help you get acquainted with the game mechanics and provide engaging gameplay. Each level will be a new test for your logic and imagination.

  • Simple and Intuitive Controls
    Easily control the dinosaur figures using the left and right mouse buttons. Move and rotate the dinosaurs to perfectly fit them onto the grid.

  • Atmospheric Musical Accompaniment
    Immerse yourself in a relaxing atmosphere with specially selected music and sounds that will transport you to the world of dinosaurs.

  • Convenient Hint System
    If you get stuck on a level, use the hint system to find the right solution and progress further without any hassle.

Ready to Start a Prehistoric Adventure?

Download the Dinosaurs in Place demo and start playing right now!

name: Dinosaurs in Place Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB +
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Try the Dinosaurs in Place demo! In this exciting 2D puzzle game, you'll meet the first 22 prehistoric friends and solve 10 unique levels. Experience the atmosphere and mechanics before diving into the full version!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
